text: "Wake Me Up" is a song by Swedish DJ and record producer Avicii. It was released as the lead single from his debut studio album True. It was written by Avicii, Mike Einziger, and Aloe Blacc. American soul singer Aloe Blacc provides vocals for the track == Charts == === Weekly charts === Chart (2013) Peak position Bulgaria (IFPI) 1 Brazil (Billboard Brasil Hot 100) 1 Brazil Hot Pop Songs 1 Colombia (National-Report) 19 Greece Airplay (IFPI) 1 Greece Digital Songs (Billboard) 1 Lebanon (The Official Lebanese Top 20) 1 Luxembourg Digital Songs (Billboard) 1 Mexican Anglo Chart (Monitor Latino) 2 Portugal Digital Songs (Billboard) 1 Romania (Airplay 100) Note: User may scroll down the 'Podcasturi' menu to play or download the respective podcast. 1 Slovenia (SloTop50) 1 Venezuela Pop Rock General (Record Report) 1 Chart (2018) Peak position Chart (2020) Peak position Global Excl.
